snippet: David Battel, who has been taking black-and-white pictures on Eighth Avenue in Midtown Manhattan for over 20 years, pays homage to luminaries like Garry Winogrand.
abstract: Work of street photographer David Battel, who has been taking black and white photographs of people in Midtown Manhattan for past 30 years, can be seen at Rick Wester Fine Art in Chelsea.
lead_paragraph: David Battel, who has been taking black-and-white pictures on Eighth Avenue in Midtown Manhattan for over 20 years, pays homage to luminaries like Garry Winogrand.

headline.main: Street Photographer at Port Authority Captures Another Era
